entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
